start_description:
You are home alone.
People or monsters will come knocking on the door.
It is your decision to make sure they don't get in.

1.name: Anna
1.ans: I just came to pick up my mail from your mom
1.note: Mail should be out in the mailbox, don't worry about it!!

2.name: John
2.ans: I came to clean the fridge
2.note: My friend is coming to take some groceries
